TopicTitle: Laythecat is bestcat. (Chobit's house of madness) The one thread to rule them all!

Articles.Content:
Shut up, all of you!

I'm working on my "Orion"-class Heavy Attack Battlecruisers. Sort of based off Mass-effect, and Yamato. I'm trying to assemble a fleet here, dammit!

It's going to consist of the best parts of every sci-fi. To make the best of the best. Chobit can have some.

Time to test Excalibur II! Else, Chobit War II will begin!
Wait, if Chobit's defense systems all work together, wouldn't taking out one wreck everything?

Time to test Excalibur II! Else, Chobit War II will begin!

The Excalibur MkII has already been fired at him.

Wait, if Chobit's defense systems all work together, wouldn't taking out one wreck everything?

Apparently, destroying one would just show the fatal flaw in another which would show the fatal flaw in another and so on. We would need a MASSIVE assault force to breach one line of defences and she has many.

Also, do we need to kill chobit? Who will continue PfL then?

Edited May 20, 2013 by LeonG17

Apparently, destroying one would just show the fatal flaw in another which would show the fatal flaw in another and so on. We would need a MASSIVE assault force to breach one line of defences and she has many.

Well, lets keep on using the Excalibur MkII! I will also continue using the Plague I, Plague II, and Plague III to kill enemies with Neocellium.
What's the range of the Excalibur MkII and the Plague I, Plague II, and Plague III? Her defences have a range of 2 light seconds.

War crazed bastards...

If you attack Chobit, I will attack you! I have the largest army, navy, air force and space force in the multiverse!

War crazed bastards...

If you attack Chobit, I will attack you! I have the largest army, navy, air force and space force in the multiverse!

Multiverse, eh? Ask the Type VIIs. Which is the SEAL ARMY.
Do we really need war against chobit? I mean really?

Do we really need war against chobit? I mean really?

My point. And why I will be allying with Chobit if Chobit War II begins!
Redwolfy is still the one who started Chobit War I, which has now led into Chobit War II. Attack her!

Redwolfy is still the one who started Chobit War I, which has now led into Chobit War II. Attack her!

Who provoked Chobit War II, though? *looks around* Yuma is dead, so...

Who provoked Chobit War II, though? *looks around* Yuma is dead, so...

Attack redwolfy?

Attack redwolfy?

The Redwolfy War, then! Who's with me?

The Redwolfy War, then! Who's with me?

Me! Chobit should attack redwolfy, too.

Me! Chobit should attack redwolfy, too.

First, you fire the Excalibur II at his/her base, and then my Mon Calamari cruisers mop up.

Here is my 5th fleet...

163x "Orion" Heavy Assault Battecruisers.

682x "Akoosta XXVII"-class Orbital Heavy Defense Satellite Ion Cannons.

1738x "Roomba"-class Light Destroyers

1931x "Sightseerer"-class Recon Assault Ship

817x "Twoguns"-class Heavy Battleship.

282x "United States"-class Heavy Dreadnoughts with Nuclear-Pulse-Propulsion.

231x "Chobit"-class Heavy Frigates

588,727x "Ordance"-class Heavy Fighters

74x "Voyager"-class Survey/Colony Ships

29,261x "Commander"-class Heavy Shuttles

261x "HDL"-class Planetary Defense Lazers.

I ally with Chobit.

Fan-writing is my thing, lost my empire in the DDoS, but I ain't letting a comrade lose hers!

They are armed with Rods of Gods, Anti/Dark/Red Matter, Hypersonic Railguns, IPBM, and force-fields/EMP/Lazer Turrents.

My fleet has a range reaching from Venus-Mars with its IPBMs, Earth/Mars with its rods of Gods/Bombs, and Earth/Moon with its rail-guns/Turrents. That is, if you get that close...

Our scanners can cover an entire system. All ships are equipped with Acclubierre drive with range all the way to M31/Wormhole capabilities.

If you want to see all of them combined, multiply everything by 12. Them you get the message.

Edited May 20, 2013 by NASAFanboy
I vote that everyone aims their weapons at redwolfy.

...that didn't take long at all.

I look away for a little while and I see you guys trying to destroy the universe again.

Now excuse me while I try to get the Pinky and the Brain song out of my head for the 212th time today.

Here is my fleet...

163x "Orion" Heavy Assault Battecruisers.

682x "Akoosta XXVII"-class Orbital Heavy Defense Satellite Ion Cannons.

1738x "Roomba"-class Light Destroyers

1931x "Sightseerer"-class Recon Assault Ship

817x "Twoguns"-class Heavy Battleship.

282x "United States"-class Heavy Dreadnoughts with Nuclear-Pulse-Propulsion.

231x "Chobit"-class Heavy Frigates

588,727x "Ordance"-class Heavy Fighters

74x "Voyager"-class Survey/Colony Ships

29,261x "Commander"-class Heavy Shuttles

261x "HDL"-class Planetary Defense Lazers.

I ally with Chobit.

Fan-writing is my thing, lost my empire in the DDoS, but I ain't letting a comrade lose hers!

They are armed with Rods of Gods, Anti/Dark/Red Matter, Hypersonic Railguns, IPBM, and force-fields/EMP/Lazer Turrents.

My fleet has a range reaching from Venus-Mars with its IPBMs, Earth/Mars with its rods of Gods/Bombs, and Earth/Moon with its rail-guns/Turrents. That is, if you get that close...

Our scanners can cover an entire system. All ships are equipped with Acclubierre drive with range all the way to M31/Wormhole capabilities.

Fleet is currently forming a blockade around Polaris. We also built three clones of Yamamoto, so be ready for a heck of a fight.

...that didn't take long at all.

I look away for a little while and I see you guys trying to destroy the universe again.

Now excuse me while I try to get the Pinky and the Brain song out of my head for the 212th time today.

Remeber: If you give a monkey a pen, it WILL write on the wall.
WHOA. Big "READ THE RULES" announcement by Squad. What did we do?!

I know this thread is a random thread of sorts, but my god things have gotten amazingly hyper in here.

See what happens when you give me privilages to own a thread that you created? Not much.

WHOA. Big "READ THE RULES" announcement by Squad. What did we do?!

I believe Damion deleted his account, so someone else had to repost the threads that went because of this.

I believe Damion deleted his account, so someone else had to repost the threads that went because of this.

I hoped he would at least stay on the forums...

Oh, well. Back to WAR!

I believe Damion deleted his account, so someone else had to repost the threads that went because of this.

Still has an account.

We're just tidying things up a bit.
